_comment: Original PPL: source={{index_name | default('opensearch-client-ingest-data-new')}} | where host = 'service.internal' | stats max(bytesReqHdrFe), max(bytesReqHdrBe), max(bytesReqBodyFe), max(bytesReqBodyBe), max(bytesRespHdrFe), max(bytesRespHdrBe), max(bytesRespBodyFe), max(reqContentLength), max(putBufferedBytes) | head 10000
